Name: Shecan
Description: Iranian DNS known to bypass some local restrictions.

Description: Alternative Shecan servers for stability.

Description: Iranian DNS optimized for gaming routes.

Description: Known Iranian DNS for bypass usage.

Description: Iranian DNS sometimes used for filtering bypass.

Name: 403 DNS
Description: Advanced bypass DNS for developers and restricted services.

Name: Radar Game
Description: Specialized Iranian bypass DNS for low-latency gaming.

Name: Pishgaman
Description: Local Iranian bypass DNS frequently used for gaming and service access.

Name: Asiatech Web-Game
Description: Optimized Asiatech internal DNS for lower ping and content bypass.

Name: Cloudflare
Description: Very fast, privacy-focused global DNS. Supports DoH/DoT.

Name: Google
Description: Reliable global DNS with excellent uptime.

Name: Quad9
Description: Security-focused DNS that blocks malicious domains.

Name: AdGuard DNS
Description: Blocks ads, trackers, and malware.

Name: AdGuard Family
Description: Ad blocking + adult content filtering.

Name: Clean Browsing Family
Description: Family-safe DNS with adult filtering.

Name: OpenDNS Family
Description: Cisco OpenDNS with parental control.

Name: UncensoredDNS
Description: Danish uncensored DNS focused on freedom and privacy.

Name: DNS.Watch
Description: German no-logging DNS service.

Name: Mullvad DNS
Description: Strong privacy DNS from Mullvad VPN.

Name: NextDNS
Description: Customizable DNS with profiles for privacy, security and bypass.

Name: ControlD
Description: Highly customizable DNS for region unlock and filtering.

Name: Level3 (Lumen)
Description: Backbone provider DNS, very low latency.

Name: Comodo Secure DNS
Description: Stable DNS often good for gaming.

Name: Shatel DNS
Description: Local ISP DNS, good for internal routing speed.

Name: AliDNS (Alibaba)
Description: The most popular DNS in China. Best for accessing Chinese apps/sites and low latency in Asia.

Name: Baidu DNS
Description: Fast and reliable Chinese DNS with high security and anti-hijacking features.

Name: Censurfridns (Denmark)
Description: Privately run, uncensored DNS from Denmark. No logging, no filtering.

Name: FreeDNS (Austria)
Description: A privacy-first European DNS located in Austria. No redirection or logging.

Name: OpenNIC (USA/Global)
Description: Democratic, community-governed DNS that avoids corporate censorship.

Name: Hurricane Electric (USA)
Description: Backbone provider DNS. Extremely stable and robust routing.

Name: Tencent DNS (DNSPod)
Description: Major Chinese provider. Excellent for bypassing regional content locks in Asia.

Name: CyberGhost DNS
Description: Secure DNS from the privacy giant. Good for bypassing ISP tracking.

Name: Neustar UltraDNS (Family)
Description: US-based filtered DNS for blocking adult and malicious content.

Name: Irancell (MTN)
Description: Official Irancell DNS. Best for internal routing on MTNIrancell SIM cards.

Name: Hamrah-e-Aval (MCI)
Description: Official MCI DNS. Recommended for users on the Hamrah-e-Aval mobile network.

Name: RighTel
Description: Official RighTel DNS. Fast response times for RighTel 3G/4G/5G users.

Name: Zitel
Description: Zitel TD-LTE DNS. Known for high stability and low latency in Tehran/Karaj.

Name: Pars Online
Description: Major ADSL/Fiber provider DNS. Reliable for local web browsing.

Name: Asiatech
Description: General Asiatech ISP DNS for ADSL and OWA users.

Name: Pishgaman
Description: Pishgaman Kavir Yazd DNS, used for wide-area ADSL connections.

Name: Afranet
Description: Afranet Data Center DNS, very low latency for internal hosting queries.

Name: Starlink Default
Description: Official SpaceX Starlink DNS. Optimized for satellite handovers and low-earth orbit routing.

Name: Alternate DNS
Description: Global ad-blocking and privacy DNS that often escapes common filtering.

Name: CIRA Canadian Shield
Description: High-security Canadian DNS, excellent for privacy and stability.

Name: Yandex DNS
Description: Russian DNS provider, often provides fast routes for Eastern European traffic.

Name: Level 3 (Legacy)
Description: Standard Level 3 communications DNS used by many global backbones.
